system.effect: The detonation leaves the target's face a bloody ruin from scores of cuts. Permanent scarring is very likely. The target suffers 2 levels of Fatigue and must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer [[1d10]] points of Perception and Fellowship damage.

description.value:
Explosive Damage to Head (Severity 3)

The detonation leaves the target's face a bloody ruin from scores of cuts. Permanent scarring is very likely. The target suffers 2 levels of Fatigue and must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer [[1d10]] points of Perception and Fellowship damage.
